titleStmt.title: An Act for reviving an Act impowering judges for probate of wills, and granting administrations
Public General Acts. 1659.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Tuesday, July 19. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Tho. St Nicholas clerk of the Parliament.
Continues an Act passed on 19 May 1659, until 10 October 1659.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
